projects.name: ASYLUM: From the designer of Scratches
projects.blurb: A psychological horror adventure inspired by H. P. Lovecraft and set in a massive, decaying mental institute.

projects.name: Heroes of Steel - Fantasy RPG
projects.blurb: Fantasy RPG set in the fallen world of Steel. Build a team of unique characters to fight the dark powers in a turn-based strategy game.

projects.name: Nick D's Video Game Vault
projects.blurb: Love classic video games? Me too! I'm trying to break some barriers in my area with selling them at a reasonable price.

projects.name: Race the Sun - An Infinite Speed Experience
projects.blurb: Intense racing through infinite sandbox worlds. Includes community multiplayer and the Simplex World Creator. (PC/Mac/Linux)

projects.name: Jon Shafer's At the Gates
projects.blurb: Lead a barbarian kingdom to glory during the final days of the Roman Empire. An empire builder by Jon Shafer, designer of Civ 5.

projects.name: Enemy
projects.blurb: The video games you played as a kid, mashed together and remade into a tactical roguelike.

projects.name: Spirit Lake: The Game
projects.blurb: Bridging adventure gaming and math. Creating games kids want to play. Improving math scores. Revolutionizing education.

projects.name: DELVER’S DROP
projects.blurb: Play as scoundrels attempting to escape ever-shifting dungeons in a stylish physics-based Action RPG: PC Mac Linux iOS Android OUYA

projects.name: Terra Incognita - A retro inspired RPG
projects.blurb: Terra Incognita is a retro inspired, turn based, Role playing game for Windows. If stretch goals are met Mac/Linux/Android/Ouya & WiiU

projects.name: Dreamfall Chapters: The Longest Journey
projects.blurb: Dreamfall Chapters is the long-awaited sequel to acclaimed PC adventure games The Longest Journey and Dreamfall: The Longest Journey

projects.name: Fiz: The Brewery Management Game
projects.blurb: Fiz is a 16-bit style single-player brewery management simulation game. Make and market your own beer and grow your brewery!

projects.name: Sawena- An indie RPG game
projects.blurb: Sawena is a RPG game based on an upcoming fantasy novel. Focusing on story and game-play, but we need to buy a license to distribute it

projects.name: Spatial Flux
projects.blurb: A Pixel Art Style, 2D Space Adventure for PC, Mac and Linux, with random consequences, events, upgrades & exploration.

projects.name: Sunshine Compound
projects.blurb: A free-to-play, cult themed browser game.  The Great Lord commandeth we make fun of farming games and we obey!

projects.name: Whispering Willows - Horror Puzzle Game for OUYA, PC, Linux
projects.blurb: Elena must control her spirit to save her father. Help ghosts and solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of the Willows Mansion.

projects.name: Throw Trucks With Your Mind!
projects.blurb: I have wired an EEG headset that reads your brain into a video game to give you telekinetic super-powers controlled with your thoughts.

projects.name: Ascension Online
projects.blurb: Bring the Ascension Deckbuilding Game to Android and PC with new features like online tournaments, campaign mode, and more!

projects.name: Poker Smash
projects.blurb: Tetris Attack + Poker = Poker Smash!

projects.name: There Came an Echo
projects.blurb: There Came an Echo is a voice-controlled real-time strategy game, starring Wil Wheaton!

projects.name: Mage's Initiation - A Classic Sierra-style Adventure/RPG
projects.blurb: An enchanting Adventure/RPG set in a magical realm. Master spells, battle foes, and quest forth in this full-length game.
